3 With little clarity on how consumers will behave in the face of a potentially worsening economy, airlines are struggling to accurately forecast their business. 3 “Amid the current macroeconomic uncertainty, it is difficult to forecast given recent and short-lived booking trends,” Southwest said. 3 Weakening travel demand has compounded the challenge for Southwest, which has been struggling to find its footing after the COVID-19 pandemic. REUTERS

The lot is worse for airlines like Southwest that mostly rely on price-sensitive leisure customers and predominantly serve the US domestic market. Southwest said bookings softened throughout the March quarter in domestic leisure travel, where the airline has more exposure compared to its rivals like Delta and United.
